      • setBoardPointValue

        public void setBoardPointValue(int val)
        Tracks the value of the redeem of a board, and everytime decreases following the red skull marker rules
        Parameters:
        val - is the integer corresponding to the maximum value of this board to give to the player that kills this board's owner.

      • getBoardPointValue

        public int getBoardPointValue()
        Return the maximum value of a player board in order to calculate every player's corresponding points when the owner of the board dies
        Returns:
        the poins value of the board.

        Returns:
        true or false if the player can or cannot use enhanced loot

      • setEnhancedLoot

        public void setEnhancedLoot(boolean bVal)
        Sets the bVal to true if a player sustained enough damage to be allowed to use the enhanced action
        Parameters:
        bVal - is the boolean value to be modified if the action is allowed
